content.text: Hi there! I'm a huge fan of cosplay and I'm also trying to eat healthier.
Hey there! I'm also a fan of cosplay and I'm trying to eat healthier too!
That's awesome! What kind of cosplay do you like to do?
I like to do video game cosplays the most.
That's so cool! I'm more into anime cosplays.
That's cool too! Have you ever been to a convention?
I have! I went to Anime Expo last year and it was amazing!
Oh nice! I went to Comic Con last year and it was so much fun!
I bet it was! I've always wanted to go to Comic Con.
You should definitely go! It's so much fun!
I will have to look into it!
Yeah you should! It's a great experience!
